name: trigger script
desc: Allows any change in a module property to trigger a python script.

properties.name: Triggers
properties.desc: The parameters used to trigger our script to execute.

properties.name: Run On Load
properties.desc:
Determines whether the module is allowed to execute when the application is being loaded.

Set to True to allow this module to run.

properties.name: Trigger
properties.desc: The parameter which triggered the script

properties.name: Edit Script In Editor
properties.desc: This opens a script editor for the selected Python script.

properties.name: Create Default Script
properties.desc: This creates a default script file, and assigns it to the Filename parameter.
